languages.text: "Пока вы отсутствовали, мы получили высоких гостей из Экклезиархии. Служители Адептус Министорум сочли, что ваше тщание в вопросе предержания Человечества в чистоте и повиновении заслуживает награды. Я с гордостью вручаю вам этот дар, ибо для каждого ревностного слуги Бога-Императора честь и слава — иметь над собой столь праведного владыку, как вы!"

traits.locale_text: "Пока вы отсутствовали, мы получили высоких гостей из Экклезиархии. Служители Адептус Министорум сочли, что ваше тщание в вопросе предержания Человечества в чистоте и повиновении заслуживает награды. Я с гордостью вручаю вам этот дар, ибо для каждого ревностного слуги Бога-Императира честь и слава — иметь над собой столь праведного владыку, как вы!"

languages.text: "In your absence, we had the honour of receiving eminent guests from the Ecclesiarchy. The Adeptus Ministorum has seen fit to reward your diligence in keeping Humanity pure and obedient. I am proud to present this gift to you, for every resolute servant of the God-Emperor considers it a blessing to be guided by a {mf|lord|lady} as righteous as you!"
languages.original_text: "Пока вы отсутствовали, мы получили высоких гостей из Экклезиархии. Служители Адептус Министорум сочли, что ваше тщание в вопросе предержания Человечества в чистоте и повиновении заслуживает награды. Я с гордостью вручаю вам этот дар, ибо для каждого ревностного слуги Бога-Императора честь и слава — иметь над собой столь праведного владыку, как вы!"

traits.locale_text: "While you were absent, we received high-ranked guests from the Ecclesiarchy. Ministers of Adeptus Ministorum decided that your diligence in keeping the Humanity pure and obedient deserves a reward. I am proud to give you this gift, for every faithful servant of the God-Emperor considers it an honour to be commanded by such a righteous lord as you!"

"While you were absent, we received high-ranked guests from the Ecclesiarchy. Ministers of Adeptus Ministorum decided that your diligence in keeping the Humanity pure and obedient deserves a reward. I am proud to give you this gift, for every faithful servant of the God-Emperor considers it an honour to be commanded by such a righteous lord as you!"

"While you were absent, we received some high-ranking guests from the Ecclesiarchy. Ministers of the Adeptus Ministorum decided that your diligence in keeping humanity pure and obedient deserves a reward. I am proud to give you this gift, for every faithful servant of the God-Emperor considers it an honour to be commanded by such a righteous lord as you!"

"While you were absent, we received some high-ranking guests from the Ecclesiarchy. Ministers of the Adeptus Ministorum decided that your diligence in keeping humanity pure and obedient deserves a reward. I am proud to give you this gift, for every faithful servant of the God-Emperor considers it an honour to be commanded by such a righteous lord as you!"

"In your absence, we had the honour of receiving eminent guests from the Ecclesiarchy. The Adeptus Ministorum has seen fit to reward your diligence in keeping Humanity pure and obedient. I am proud to present this gift to you, for every resolute servant of the God-Emperor considers it a blessing to be guided by a {mf|lord|lady} as righteous as you!"

languages.text: “您不在的这段时间，我们有幸接待了来自国教的尊贵客人。国教教会的牧师认为，您在保持纯洁与服从帝国方面做出了相当程度的努力，值得嘉奖。我很荣幸能把这份礼物献给您，因为神皇每位虔诚的仆人都坚信，能服侍您这样的正义之人是他们的荣耀，大人！”
languages.original_text: "In your absence, we had the honour of receiving eminent guests from the Ecclesiarchy. The Adeptus Ministorum has seen fit to reward your diligence in keeping Humanity pure and obedient. I am proud to present this gift to you, for every resolute servant of the God-Emperor considers it a blessing to be guided by a {mf|lord|lady} as righteous as you!"

traits.locale_text: “您不在的这段时间，我们有幸接待了来自国教的尊贵客人。国教教会的牧师认为，您在保持纯洁与服从帝国方面做出了相当程度的努力，值得嘉奖。我很荣幸能把这份礼物献给您，因为神皇每位虔诚的仆人都坚信，能服侍您这样的正义之人是他们的荣耀，大人！”

languages.text: « En votre absence, nous avons eu l'honneur de recevoir la visite de dignitaires de l'Ecclésiarchie. L'Adeptus Ministorum a jugé bon de récompenser la diligence avec laquelle vous tâchez de faire régner la pureté et l'obéissance dans les rangs de l'humanité. Je suis fière de vous remettre ce présent, car pour tout serviteur zélé de l'Empereur-Dieu, c'est une bénédiction d'être placé sous la tutelle d'{mf|un seigneur|une dame} aussi digne que vous ! »
languages.original_text: "In your absence, we had the honour of receiving eminent guests from the Ecclesiarchy. The Adeptus Ministorum has seen fit to reward your diligence in keeping Humanity pure and obedient. I am proud to present this gift to you, for every resolute servant of the God-Emperor considers it a blessing to be guided by a {mf|lord|lady} as righteous as you!"

traits.locale_text: « En votre absence, nous avons eu l'honneur de recevoir la visite de dignitaires de l'Ecclésiarchie. L'Adeptus Ministorum a jugé bon de récompenser la diligence avec laquelle vous tâchez de faire régner la pureté et l'obéissance dans les rangs de l'humanité. Je suis fière de vous remettre ce présent, car pour tout serviteur zélé de l'Empereur-Dieu, c'est une bénédiction d'être placé sous la tutelle d'{mf|un seigneur|une dame} aussi digne que vous ! »

languages.text: 「あなたのご不在中、帝国聖教会から賓客をお迎えしました。帝国宗務局は、人類を純粋で従順な存在に保とうとするあなたの行いに感動し、この贈り物与えました。私は誇りを持ち、あなたに授けます。神帝陛下に仕える私達下僕は皆、あなたのような清く正しいお方に導いていただけて、幸せです！」
languages.original_text: "In your absence, we had the honour of receiving eminent guests from the Ecclesiarchy. The Adeptus Ministorum has seen fit to reward your diligence in keeping Humanity pure and obedient. I am proud to present this gift to you, for every resolute servant of the God-Emperor considers it a blessing to be guided by a {mf|lord|lady} as righteous as you!"

traits.locale_text: 「あなたのご不在中、帝国聖教会から賓客をお迎えしました。帝国宗務局は、人類を純粋で従順な存在に保とうとするあなたの行いに感動し、この贈り物与えました。私は誇りを持ち、あなたに授けます。神帝陛下に仕える私達下僕は皆、あなたのような清く正しいお方に導いていただけて、幸せです！」

languages.text: «Durante su ausencia hemos tenido el honor de recibir visitantes ilustres de la Eclesiarquía. El Adeptus Ministorum ha decidido recompensar su diligencia a la hora de mantener la pureza y la obediencia de la Humanidad. Por eso me enorgullece poder entregarle este regalo, ¡todo sirviente fiel del Dios Emperador considera una bendición servir a un{mf||a} señor{mf||a} tan justo como usted!».
languages.original_text: "In your absence, we had the honour of receiving eminent guests from the Ecclesiarchy. The Adeptus Ministorum has seen fit to reward your diligence in keeping Humanity pure and obedient. I am proud to present this gift to you, for every resolute servant of the God-Emperor considers it a blessing to be guided by a {mf|lord|lady} as righteous as you!"

traits.locale_text: «Durante su ausencia hemos tenido el honor de recibir visitantes ilustres de la Eclesiarquía. El Adeptus Ministorum ha decidido recompensar su diligencia a la hora de mantener la pureza y la obediencia de la Humanidad. Por eso me enorgullece poder entregarle este regalo, ¡todo sirviente fiel del Dios Emperador considera una bendición servir a un{mf||a} señor{mf||a} tan justo como usted!».

languages.text: "Wir hatten in Eurer Abwesenheit die Ehre, ehrenwerte Gäste der Ekklesiarchie zu empfangen. Das Adeptus Ministorum hat entschieden, dass die Hingabe, mit der Ihr für die Reinheit und Gehorsamkeit der Menschheit sorgt, eine Belohnung verdient. Ich bin stolz, Euch dieses Geschenk zu überreichen, denn jeder entschlossene Diener des Gottimperators sieht es als Segen an, von {mf|einem derart rechtschaffenen Lord|einer derart rechtschaffenen Lady} angeführt zu werden, wie Ihr es seid!"
languages.original_text: "In your absence, we had the honour of receiving eminent guests from the Ecclesiarchy. The Adeptus Ministorum has seen fit to reward your diligence in keeping Humanity pure and obedient. I am proud to present this gift to you, for every resolute servant of the God-Emperor considers it a blessing to be guided by a {mf|lord|lady} as righteous as you!"

traits.locale_text: "Wir hatten in Eurer Abwesenheit die Ehre, ehrenwerte Gäste der Ekklesiarchie zu empfangen. Das Adeptus Ministorum hat entschieden, dass die Hingabe, mit der Ihr für die Reinheit und Gehorsamkeit der Menschheit sorgt, eine Belohnung verdient. Ich bin stolz, Euch dieses Geschenk zu überreichen, denn jeder entschlossene Diener des Gottimperators sieht es als Segen an, von {mf|einem derart rechtschaffenen Lord|einer derart rechtschaffenen Lady} angeführt zu werden, wie Ihr es seid!"

languages.text: "Yokluğunuzda Ekleşiarşi'den birtakım seçkin konukları ağırlama şerefine nail olduk. Adeptus Ministorum, İnsanlığı saf ve itaatkâr tutma hususundaki gayretlerinizi ödüllendirmeyi uygun görmüş. Bu hediyeyi size takdim etmekten gurur duyuyorum. Tanrı İmparator'un azimli her bir hizmetkârı, sizin gibi erdemli bir {mf|lordun|leydinin} rehberliğinde yol almayı lütuf kabul eder!"
languages.original_text: "In your absence, we had the honour of receiving eminent guests from the Ecclesiarchy. The Adeptus Ministorum has seen fit to reward your diligence in keeping Humanity pure and obedient. I am proud to present this gift to you, for every resolute servant of the God-Emperor considers it a blessing to be guided by a {mf|lord|lady} as righteous as you!"
